entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18 with temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness near midnight. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18 with temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. Wind chill minus 27 this evening. Forecast issued 11:36 PM MDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing near noon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:36 PM MDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
